title: SMB
author: SMB
created_time: October 02, 2023, 08:53:29 AMLast edit: October 04, 2023, 09:33:34 AM by SMB
content: I buy your BTC for SEPA EU at from -5% ( depends on amount )LTC and XMR would be possible to.Been here over 5 years so really no reason to steal your funds.Min would be like €100If you want to trade each time for 100 Euro its fine for me.

comments.author: SMB
comments.body: Ofcourse i do accept escrow.If its a reputable member who did escrows before.If its not the case smallest €100 trades.

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: Quote from: SMB on October 04, 2023, 01:56:13 PMOfcourse i do accept escrow.If its a reputable member who did escrows before.If its not the case smallest €100 trades.Got it, if you can find us someone here at the forum who can play the middleman let's go for a 3500 EUR deal. I can do both Instant SEPA and SEPA.

comments.author: BitSwapNow
comments.body: We do offer other options to receive EURO and many other currencies. BitSwapNow.com offers 850+ crypto pairs for instant cross-chain swaps as well as buying and selling for a wide range of fiat currencies. No sign-up is required and you can start swapping instantly.

comments.author: DUPONDIUS
comments.body: Quote from: SMBI pay like lets say -5% under marketprice. I dont ask KYC  All depends on amount if its worthed.What do you ask for as a KYC?If identification occurs, is the ratio 1=1?From which country in the euro zone do you send the money (SEPA transfer)?Thanks.

comments.author: SMB
comments.body: Quote from: DUPONDIUS on October 14, 2023, 09:05:43 PMQuote from: SMBI pay like lets say -5% under marketprice. I dont ask KYC  All depends on amount if its worthed.What do you ask for as a KYC?If identification occurs, is the ratio 1=1?From which country in the euro zone do you send the money (SEPA transfer)?Thanks.No KYC  Transaction to method IBAN SEPA ( Look it up for your bank if it can recieve SEPA )Bankaccount must have an IBAN Bankaccount number.As written before the rate i pay is -5%
